r? @aturon

files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,26 @@

+// except according to those terms.
+
+struct Str([u8]);
+
+#[deriving(Clone)]
+struct CharSplits<'a, Sep> {
+    string: &'a Str,
+    sep: Sep,
+    allow_trailing_empty: bool,
+    only_ascii: bool,
+    finished: bool,
+}
+
+fn clone(s: &Str) -> &Str {
+    Clone::clone(&s)
+}
+
+fn main() {}
